website_summaries.verdict: Affordable water filter pitcher with some nice features. Filters numerous types of contaminants including chlorine and lead.
pros: 5-stage filtration gives water a crisp, clean taste
Comes with 3 filters for 6-months of fresh-tasting water
cons: Prone to leaking if you overfill it

customer_reviews.title: Best Filter Jug ever
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this. Not had a filter jug for year because just extra clutter on work top. This fits nicely in fridge door. I love the easy fill lid so simple. The design is much better than old style models, the cartridge is locked in underneath and no chance of it dislodging while pouring water. I have now dispensed with all my Brita cartridges that had to go in kettle and coffee machine and just fill everything from this jug. Much cheaper than Brita for the jug and the spare cartridges and a superior design
customer_reviews.author: MrsKent

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Filter Water Jug
customer_reviews.text: We researched loads of different filtered water jugs and finally settled on this one. We wanted one that had 60 day cartridges but was still value for money and good reviews. Very happy with this purchase. Love the easy fill lid, just slide the slots open, fill with tap water, then close again. Careful not to overfill as it can spill a bit if there is too much water and you pour to fast. But simple enough to avoid doing that. Makes the water taste so much nicer!
customer_reviews.author: Jess A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my extremely old Brita, because the price including three 2 month cartridges was roughly equivalent to buying six one month cartridges for that jug. I've been using it for about two weeks and it seems to be working well. I never drink water straight from a filter as I prefer the taste of tap water, but I have to use filtered in my kettle otherwise it has a metallic taint to it. This filter jug results in good tasting tea so it must be doing it's job. It's also really easy to fill, pours better than my old jug (it WAS very old and a bit leaky) and looks smart. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Deborah R. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Better than a Brita all ends up!
customer_reviews.text: Works better than a Brita and cheaper. Laboratory testing showed it got rid of twice the crap from our tap water as the Brita Maxtra did. Cartridges last 60 days and are cheaper too. Update: The first filter worked fine for the 60 days. It was changed 6 days ago and was also OK for a few days until it started taking an hour to drain through. Writing to Optima to see what they are prepared to do. I again changed the filter yesterday and will see if that last longer than a week!
customer_reviews.author: webwise

customer_reviews.title: Good value and effective
customer_reviews.text: Had this a few months now. I bought it because it was time to replace the custom water filter on my coffee machine and it was a lot cheaper to buy this jug with 3 filters than to get even 2 filters for the coffee machine. I'm also using the water from the jug to fill the kettle and it has reduced the amount of scaling in it. I don't feel the need to filter drinking water and in fact prefer the taste of it unfiltered but it is making a difference to the appliances we use the water in.
customer_reviews.author: A. Preston

customer_reviews.title: I am not completely convinced by this filter
customer_reviews.text: OK - this is quite an usual situation, but I purchased a water filter as I have a plant which is trained to grow on lava... bear with me... you feed the plant by adding water to a tray which is then soaked up by the lava so the tree can absorb it. You need to use filtered water or the lava ends up getting white marks. Having used only filtered water from this filter - I still get the white marks. Okay I have given it 3 star still because this is quite a niche example... but still!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, rubbish design
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they've ever used a jug with a pouring spout before? - Leave the hinged spout cover on, widens the pour from a narrow stream to a guaranteed spill, even into a kettle. - Pour with even the slightest amount of water in the top container, it leaks past the stupid filling shutter: again, guaranteed spill. - Filling shutter not the best design: tap has to be close to it when filling, otherwise splashes everywhere. We'd already got some of their design filters for a good price, so after a year, when the filters are used, it's in the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: It's very clear water and tastes more thin and fresh
customer_reviews.text: Its brilliant..so happy with this,was easy to assemble and fits in the fridge perfect even tho the jug is a tad wide but had no problems. I get paranoid about the lime scale in the tap water getting in my teeth and in my tummy etc so this has put my mind at rest knowing I am drinking clean water not hard water no more! Thank you amazon for fast deliver and tidy packaging
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: SELL ME A SPARE CARRIER FOR ORIGINAL "SUPERIOR"JUG!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed,because the jug's too wide for my frige door!...you didn't specify measurements!..Also,compated to my old filter jug?there's a huge expanse (almost half the jug)...of empty jug & half is water!...I preferred my original optima jug,just a tiny piece of plastic cracked off the carrier where the filter clicks into place.Can't you just sell me a new carrier please?
customer_reviews.author: sylviehone

customer_reviews.title: Aqua Optima Water Filter
customer_reviews.text: Pleased that we have replacement jug, after dropping & breaking 1 of our 2 water filter. It is the same make, therefore uses the same some of filter, but holds less water; Only holds about 1100 ml. The older jug, 1 of which we still have holds about 1600 ml. Everything else is good, like the 60 day water filters
customer_reviews.author: Nicx

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: What a brilliant design...filling the jug up is so much easier than others...i read one review before i bought this saying they couldnt get the filter to stay under the water...the filter is fitted on the under side of the inner jug not loosely on top..fits great in my fridge door and my fridge isn't that big so overall yeah i recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David l

customer_reviews.title: Good filter but filter not lasting 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This has been great, our water was leaving a lot of scum in our brews and the taste had changed. This has sorted that right out for us. The filters have only been lasting a month so not sure if it’s down to our water, how much we use it or the quality of the product. If the filters lasted 2 months as advertised this would have been a 5 star rating, but for the price it’s good value anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Grady

customer_reviews.title: Value for money for sure
customer_reviews.text: This black thing came out from the filter despite me following the guidelines of putting the filter in the water for 10 mins. Maybe I should have had it for longer. But the taste of the water is great! And I think it’s a really good value for money, since you get 3 additional replacement filters with it. Those filters are expensive otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: usha

customer_reviews.title: huge disappointment. Bad quality of the Jug and filters.
customer_reviews.text: Replacement filters are rubbish, muddy water comes all the time no matter how long you rinse the filter. Lid is faulty, doesn't stay on top and falls off with every use.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: Aqua Optima filter jug and refills.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, for taking the chlorine out the tap water, as personally, I don't want to drink, bleach, funnily enough. It was also a good buy, at the price. I now have my old one, at work and this one, at home. Wouldn't be without them now.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Evans

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and make is okay
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and look. Seems to do the filter job well. On our jug the refill compartment lid slots do not fully close, not sure if it is our specific problem or a fault on all jugs. I haven't returned as we wash it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: AS007

customer_reviews.title: Hard water device
customer_reviews.text: i liked the jug the moment i opened it up, it is perfect in my fridge door ready for cold diluted drinks, and makes crystal clear ice blocks, for later drinks, once the filter has cleaned the water, you get a drink of water that instantly tastes and looks clear in the glass,but best of all a much better enjoyable better tasting cup of tea. Jacqueline
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Troop

customer_reviews.title: Great water jug
customer_reviews.text: One negative is you've got to be careful to not overfill (easy to do) as water leaks out when you pour. Whatever you pour into the top has got to match what's space is left in the bottom. If you don't follow this rule your jug will leak when pouring into a glass.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Great for someone living in London and using tap water!
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible investment! If your living in the West London area, you definitely need this for the tap water used. Drink it, use for food or small appliances, makes a great difference even if I had my doubts in the beginning. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Yus

customer_reviews.title: Fridge essential
customer_reviews.text: Use this every day, a few months down the line and the jug is saving us money rather than buying bottled water. I would use the filters a bit longer than suggested, excellent product, everyone should have one
customer_reviews.author: DaisySel

customer_reviews.title: Makes water taste better (apparently)
customer_reviews.text: Living in a hard water area, apparently I needed one of these to make the water taste better (so I'm told). I can't tell the difference personally - I don't like the taste of any water, so i put juice with it. But my better half says it tastes better, so i guess it must be working.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Rat

customer_reviews.title: It sparkles clean, easy to use and no wasted bottled!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Does what it says on the tin. Good value purchase. Stop all those plastic bottles of water, I say. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Christina A. Veasey

customer_reviews.title: Arrived cracked
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with hairline crack that leaks which went from the spout to 2 inches from the base . I couldn't be bothered returning it so it sits empty on the draining board and we fill it just when we want to use it to fill the kettle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Filters water well but badly designed
customer_reviews.text: The jug lid cannot easily be cleaned because of the manner of its design and construction with gaps and bars. Dirt get trapped between the bars. The seal between the jug and the lid leaks water and so the filtered water cannot be easily used when the reservoir at the top is full. The filters which are just housed in the jug work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Fry

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Great water filter jug, but the filters supplied are not 60 day filters, they are 30 day filters according to the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: JennyBugs

customer_reviews.title: Great value jug
customer_reviews.text: Really smart looking filter, can fill it all up in one go, which is really useful. Smart feature to fill it too. The only con is though the lid doesn't always stay on or is as tight as others I have brought. Would recommend though
customer_reviews.author: Amar

customer_reviews.title: Great quality filtering.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this jug. Easy to fill thanks to the sliding cover. Easy to change cartridge and quick to filter. Water tastes fine.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, produces well flavoured clear water, but a little flimsy so take care with filling and cleaning.

customer_reviews.title: water jug

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this had it now for 4 months and I use it everyday. Highly recommend buying it great product

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the caravan but now we use it all the time. Very easy to fill and easy to change the cartridge.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great water filter easier to top up and pour than the Brita filter I have at a different house

customer_reviews.title: Good quality jug at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter, she's very pleased with it. Good quality and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I was used to drinking tap water but for some reason, I was feeling bad and I really wanted to buy a filter. I could be more satisfied now, this bottle is really good and I already feel the difference. It is good stuff to have at home and to push yourself to drink pure and light water. I highly recommend having this.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Easy filling
customer_reviews.text: Love the way you open the grill at the top to fill it up so you don’t have to take the top off. Other than that it’s a water filter but a good one

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: It’s good but it sometimes leaks when I fill it up for whatever reason.

customer_reviews.title: Best price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value, best I could find anywhere. Bought for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Davies

customer_reviews.title: Good quality jug
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for alternative to bottled water, does just that
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great jug
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of this jug and have bought another one

customer_reviews.title: Never used this type before.
customer_reviews.text: A sturdy jug which pours quickly the filter fit is different than I'm use to and took a couple of goes to fit it in. Still getting used to it but I do like it.

customer_reviews.title: Nice & clear easy to fill and change filter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Really good value for money. You get everything you need plus 2 extra filters. Fits perfectly in the fridge door.

customer_reviews.title: Great filtering Jug
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My tap water is undrinkable which is why this filtering jug is invaluable to me. Couldn’t do without it...

customer_reviews.text: It makes an huge difference, no more flavour in the water. Well built,much better than the others Perfect fit with the filter capsules with no water losses.

product_meta.title: Aqua Optima Bundle 3 60 6 Month Pack-Oria Jug with 3 x 60 Day Water Filter cartridges, White
product_meta.description: Enjoy the benefits of drinking filtered water at home with the Aqua Optima Oria Filter Jug. Aqua Optima provides a 5-step filtration system that significantly reduces impurities from tap water, such as lime scale, chlorine, heavy metals, pesticides and herbicides. Featuring a slim line design that will fit into the door of a fridge and a detachable handle, the white jug comes with a cartridge that lasts for up to 60 days/200 litres. Aqua Optima Original up to 60 day water filter fits all Aqua Optima jugs as well as Brita Maxtra (not Maxtra+) filter jugs. Brita, Maxtra & Maxtra+ are registered trademarks of Brita GmbH. All our filters are 100% recyclable through our free programme with Teracycle in the UK and EIRE, visit the Aqua Optima website and recycling page to find out your local community collection location and to find out how to sign up to send filters back direct at no cost to you.
feature_bullets: Total capacity 2.8 litres - filtered capacity 1.4 litres
All Aqua Optima filters are 100% recyclable in the UK and Eire through our free programme with Teracycle
6 Month pack - Includes 3 x Aqua Optima original 60-day filters
Free filter replacement reminder app available for Android and iPhone
Each filter lasts for up to 60 days - 200 litres. (This items has both current and new packaging, however both packaging contains the exact same product)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars351 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
